pages.text: ami kata janapadera dhbansa sadhana karechi yara adhibasira chila papi ebam tadera para srsti karechi an'ya jati.
Atahpara yakhana tara amara ayabera katha tera pela, takhana'i tara sekhana theke palayana karate lagala.
Palayana karo na ebam phire esa, yekhane tomara bilasitaya matta chile o tomadera abasagrhe; sambhabata; ke'u tomadera jijnesa karabe.
Tara balalah haya, durbhoga amadera, amara abasya'i papi chilama.
Tadera e'i artanada saba samaya chila, sesa paryanta ami taderake kare dilama yena kartita sasya o nirbapita agni.
Akasa prthibi etadubhayera madhye ya ache, ta ami kriracchale srsti karini.
Ami yadi krira upakarana srsti karate ca'itama, tabe ami amara kache ya ache ta dbara'i ta karatama, yadi amake karate hata.
Baram ami satyake mithyara upara niksepa kari, atahpara satya mithyara mastaka curna-bicurna kare deya, atahpara mithya tatksanat niscihna haye yaya. Tomara ya balacha, tara jan'ye tomadera durbhoga.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale yara ache, tara tamra'i. Ara yara tamra sannidhye ache tara tamra ibadate ahankara kare na ebam alasata'o kare na.
Tara ratridina tamra pabitrata o mahima barnana kare ebam klanta haya na.
Tara ki mrttika dbara tairi upasya grahana kareche, ye tara taderake jibita karabe
Yadi nabhomandala o bhumandale allaha byatita an'yan'ya upasya thakata, tabe ubhayera dhbansa haye yeta. Ata'eba tara ya bale, ta theke arasera adhipati allaha pabitra.
Tini ya karena, tatsamparke tini jijnasita habena na ebam taderake jijnesa kara habe.

Tara ki allaha byatita an'yan'ya upasya grahana kareche? Baluna, tomara tomadera pramana ana. Eta'i amara sangidera katha ebam eta'i amara purbabartidera katha. Baram tadera adhikansa'i satya jane na; ata'eba tara talabahana kare.
